short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shikoni Netflix Bashk Me Shoket Tuaj Njeheresh.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Netflix Party based extension in Albanian Version.
In this extension you can watch Netflix together with your friends at the same time, without any interruptions.
